title: News24.com | Coronavirus: Second SABC employee tests positive for Covid-19
description: A second employee of the South African Broadcasting Corporation has tested positive for the novel coronavirus (Covid-19), the broadcaster has announced.
content:
A
second employee of the South African Broadcasting Corporation (SABC) has tested positive
for the novel coronavirus (Covid-19), the broadcaster has announced.
The employee is based at the
SABC's headquarters at the Auckland Park office in Johannesburg, s… [+949 chars]
